priqyaM pAthOq apI#hi vaqSI tvaM dE#va sOmaq traiShTu#BEnaq CandaqsEndra#sya priqyaM pAthOq apI$hyaqsmathsa#KAq tvaM dE#va sOmaq jAga#tEnaq Canda#sAq viSvE#ShAM dEqvAnA$M priqyaM pAthOq apIqhyA na#H prAqNa E#tu parAqvataq A&ntari#kShAddiqvaspari# | 
Ayu#H pRuthiqvyA addhyaqmRuta#masi prAqNAya# 
tvA || 
iqndrAqgnI mEq varca#H kRuNutAqM ~MvarcaqH sOmOq bRuhaqspati#H ( ) | 
varcO# mEq viSvE#dEqvA varcO# mE dhattamaSvinA || 
daqdhaqnvE vAq yadIqmanuq vOcaqdbrahmA#Niq vEruq tat | 
pariq viSvA#niq kAvyA# nEqmiScaqkrami#vA Bavat || 7
(Sakva#rIShvaq - gnE - rbRuhaqspatiqH - pa~jca#vi(gm)SatiSca) (A3)
